page.title: 12Transport in rural Sowerby
page.content: {Railways} The North East coast line from King's Cross to Edinburgh and Scotland passes through this flat terrain. The trains are travelling at high speeds approximately 100 m.p.h. There are 84 passenger trains passing through daily with 20 extra on Summer Saturdays and 4 extra on Saturdays in the Winter. The local diesel multiple unit train from Darlington to York has 117 seats. The Newcastle to Liverpool has 352 seats and the High Speed Inter City Train seats about 400. Between 150 and 200 freight trains pass daily carrying steel girders, scrap steel, potash, coal, general goods, cars, containers and mineral wagons. There are 4 lines of track, the middle 2 being used by the H.S.Trains.
